manifest.author: o02c
manifest.name: Tab Navigator
manifest.description: Simple Tab Switcher, search open tabs.

manifest.author: Tokuhiro Matsuno, L7Cy
manifest.name: 2Hop Links Plus
manifest.description: Related links up to 2 hops away are displayed in a card format, allowing for easy browsing through connections between notes. Each card contains a preview of the corresponding note.

manifest.name: Timer
manifest.description: Allows you to measure time.

manifest.author: kometenstaub
manifest.name: Version History Diff
manifest.description: Diff the version history of the core Sync and File Recovery plugins and Git. Adds a command to open the core Sync version history as well.

manifest.author: davfive
manifest.name: jTab Guitar Codeblocks
manifest.description: Adds the ability to show guitar chords and tabs directly in your notes using jTab.

manifest.author: Boninall
manifest.name: Daily Notes Editor
manifest.description: Edit a bunch of daily notes in one page(inline), which works similar to Roam Research's default daily note view.

manifest.author: Aldo E George
manifest.name: LLM Test Generator
manifest.description: Generate AI-powered test questions from your notes with multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Mistral, Gemini, DeepSeek, Ollama) to enhance your learning and retention.

manifest.author: Evan Bonsignori
manifest.name: Timeline Schedule
manifest.description: Inline timelines generated from human-readable time strings, e.g. 'Walk dog (30min)' in a ```schedule codeblock.

manifest.author: Mixa
manifest.name: Mixa
manifest.description: Publish your notes and blog posts with Mixa directly from Obsidian

manifest.author: Tim Dresser
manifest.name: Siteswap
manifest.description: Visualize Juggling Pattern Siteswap via the JugglingLab gif server.

manifest.author: WakaTime
manifest.name: WakaTime
manifest.description: Automatic time tracking and metrics generated from your Obsidian usage activity.

manifest.author: 4Source
manifest.name: Settings profiles
manifest.description: Allows you to create various global settings profiles. You can sync them between different vaults. To keep all your settings in sync, you'll never have to manually adjust them again for every vault you have or create in the future.

manifest.author: Piotr Borowski
manifest.name: Size History
manifest.description: Admire the growth of your Obsidian vault with a "hand-drawn" chart.

manifest.author: Tony Grosinger
manifest.name: Advanced Tables

manifest.author: Zachary Hynes
manifest.name: Unfilled Stats Highlighter
manifest.description: The Unfilled Stats Highlighter is a practical Obsidian plugin designed to streamline your stat/habit tracking process by automatically identifying and prefixing unfilled stats, making them easier to spot and fill out. This plugin is perfect for users who frequently work with templates and require a quick and easy way to locate and complete missing information.
